_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Six things given up by a person accompli: Forms of greed that lead to rebirth in places of loss
Forms of hate that lead to rebirth in places of loss
Forms of delusion that lead to rebirth in places of loss
